function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"High indoor temperatures causing a decrement in productivity","Impact":"Loss of productivity and performance","Mitigation":"Improving ventilation and reducing indoor temperature","Technologies":"HVAC systems, air purifiers, thermal insulation","People":"Office workers, building occupants","Owner":"Building managers, employers"},{"Description":"Spread of communicable respiratory diseases through airborne aerosols","Impact":"Higher prevalence of respiratory diseases and short-term sick leave","Mitigation":"Increase ventilation rates, improve air quality, reduce occupant density","Technologies":"Ventilation systems, air filters, air quality monitors","People":"Building occupants, office workers","Owner":"Building managers, employers"},{"Description":"Low ventilation rates leading to higher prevalence of respiratory diseases","Impact":"Increased prevalence of respiratory diseases and short-term sick leave","Mitigation":"Increase ventilation rates, improve air quality, reduce occupant density","Technologies":"Ventilation systems, air filters, air quality monitors","People":"Building occupants, office workers","Owner":"Building managers, employers"}]}
